column15: Levitate Purple - Clutches  Best Price Rs 1675.00  EMI Rs 279 for 6 months FREE Shipping In Stock - Delivery in 6-8 Days
column17:
Keep your cards and cash in style with this trendy clutch from Levitate. The spacious main compartment and card slots help in organising your money safely. Durable and stylish this leather clutch is a perfect fashion accessory to compliment all your outfits .

Features
  • Brand: Levitate
  • Category: Handbags
  • Colour: Purple
  • Closure: Flap with popper fastening
  • Number of Compartments: 3
  • Card slots: 8
  • Slip pockets: Yes
  • Material: Leather
  • Inner lining: Polyester
  • Dimensions (H x L in cms): 10.5 x 19
  • Occasion: Casual/Formal
  • Style: Clutch

Care Tips
Gently brush away dust or dirt using a soft cleaning brush.
Use a leather conditioner/wax and a brush for added shine.
Avoid contact with liquids.
